com.vsegouin.mowitnow.mower.core.detection

Class Detector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vsegouin.mowitnow.mower.core.detection.Detector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class Detector
extends Object
implements Observer
    Created by v.segouin on 07/09/2016. This class reads the map which represents the area to mow, and updates the map according to the movements of the mower it can also check if a movement is safe before starting any mowing, if the mower's state is set on SAFE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Detector(int abscissa, int ordinate, Direction initialDirection, MapArea map)
      Initializes the detector with the current state of the mower.

    • Method Summary

      Get the current abscissa, ordinate and direction of the detector.
      String getCurrentStateString()
      Get the current abscissa, ordinate and direction of the detector.
      MapArea getMap() 
      PositionState getNextPositionState(WheelState wheelState)
      Simulate the mower move and get the next.
      boolean isAskedPositionSafe(WheelState wheelState)
      Check if the next move done by the mower is safe (ie : the asked position isn't outbound and there is no mower already on it).
      void update(Observable observable, Object o)
      Intercepts signal from wheels and servomotor and updates the class depending on the action Servomotor : Updates the current direction Wheel : update the map depending on the movement.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Detector

        public Detector(int abscissa,
                int ordinate,
                Direction initialDirection,
                MapArea map)
        Initializes the detector with the current state of the mower.
        Parameters:
        abscissa - initial abscissa of the mower on the area to mow
        ordinate - initial ordinate of the mower on the area to mow
        initialDirection - initial direction of the mower
        map - the area to mow

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Observable observable,
                   Object o)
        Intercepts signal from wheels and servomotor and updates the class depending on the action Servomotor : Updates the current direction Wheel : update the map depending on the movement.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
        Parameters:
        observable - a Servomotor or a wheel
        o - same as observable

      • isAskedPositionSafe

        public boolean isAskedPositionSafe(WheelState wheelState)
                            throws UnsafeMoveException
        Check if the next move done by the mower is safe (ie : the asked position isn't outbound and there is no mower already on it).
        Parameters:
        wheelState - the state of the wheel (backward, forward or still)
        Returns:
        check if there is a mower on the path or if the path is outbound
        Throws:
        UnsafeMoveException - if the asked box contains something different than grass.

      • getNextPositionState

        public PositionState getNextPositionState(WheelState wheelState)
                                   throws UnsafeMoveException
        Simulate the mower move and get the next.
        Parameters:
        wheelState - the movement to simulate
        Returns:
        the position state of the next step
        Throws:
        UnsafeMoveException - if the asked move make the mower going outside of the area.

      • getCurrentState

        public int[] getCurrentState()
        Get the current abscissa, ordinate and direction of the detector.
        Returns:
        an array of int which represents the state of the detector [0] : abscissa [1] : ordinate [2] : direction angle

      • getCurrentStateString

        public String getCurrentStateString()
        Get the current abscissa, ordinate and direction of the detector.
        Returns:
        a human readable string of the current mower's state

      • getMap

        public MapArea getMap()
